verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came to me<WH559>, saying,
Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: I am jealous<WH7065> for Zion<WH6726> with great<WH1419> jealousy<WH7068>, and I am jealous<WH7065> for her with great<WH1419> wrath<WH2534>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>: I am returned<WH7725> unto Zion<WH6726>, and will dwell<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem<WH3389>: and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall be called<WH7121> The city<WH5892> of truth<WH571>; and the mountain<WH2022> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, The holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: There shall yet old men<WH2205> and old women<WH2205> dwell<WH3427> in the streets<WH7339> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, every man<WH376> with his staff<WH4938> in his hand<WH3027> for very<WH7230> age<WH3117>.
And the streets<WH7339> of the city<WH5892> shall be full<WH4390> of boys<WH3206> and girls<WH3207> playing<WH7832> in the streets thereof<WH7339>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: If it be marvellous<WH6381> in the eyes<WH5869> of the remnant<WH7611> of this people<WH5971> in those days<WH3117>, should it also be marvellous<WH6381> in mine eyes<WH5869>? saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Behold<WH3467>, I will save my people<WH5971> from the east<WH4217> country<WH776>, and from the west<WH3996> country<WH776>;

and I will bring<WH935> them<WH7931>, and they shall dwell in the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem<WH3389>; and they shall be my people<WH5971>, and I will be their God<WH430>, in truth<WH571> and in righteousness<WH6666>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Let your hands<WH3027> be strong<WH2388>, ye that hear<WH8085> in these days<WH3117> these words<WH1697> from the mouth<WH6310> of the prophets<WH5030> that were in the day<WH3117> that the foundation<WH3245> of the house<WH1004> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> was laid<WH3245>, even the temple<WH1964>, that it might be built<WH1129>.

For before<WH6440> those days<WH3117> there was<WH1961> no hire<WH7939> for man<WH120>, nor any hire<WH7939> for beast<WH929>; neither was there any peace<WH7965> to him that went out<WH3318> or came in<WH935>, because of the adversary<WH6862>: for I set<WH7971> all men<WH120> every one<WH376> against his neighbor<WH7453>.
But now I will not be unto the remnant<WH7611> of this people<WH5971> as in the former<WH7223> days<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

For there shall be the seed<WH2233> of peace<WH7965>; the vine<WH1612> shall give<WH5414> its fruit<WH6529>, and the ground<WH776> shall give<WH5414> its increase<WH2981>, and the heavens<WH8064> shall give<WH5414> their dew<WH2919>; and I will cause the remnant<WH7611> of this people<WH5971> to inherit all these things<WH5157>.

And it shall come to pass that<WH7045>, as ye were a curse among the nations<WH1471>, O house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> and house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, so will I save<WH3467> you<WH1293>, and ye shall be a blessing. Fear<WH3372> not<WH3027>, but let your hands be strong<WH2388>.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: As I thought<WH2161> to do evil<WH7489> unto you<WH1>, when your fathers provoked me to wrath<WH7107>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, and I repented not<WH5162>;
so again<WH7725> have I thought<WH2161> in these days<WH3117> to do good<WH3190> unto Jerusalem<WH3389> and to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>: fear ye not<WH3372>.

These are the things<WH1697> that ye shall do<WH6213>: speak<WH1696> ye every man<WH376> the truth<WH571> with his neighbor<WH7453>; execute<WH8199> the judgment<WH4941> of truth<WH571> and peace<WH7965> in your gates<WH8179>;

and let none<WH376> of you devise<WH2803> evil<WH7451> in your hearts<WH3824> against his neighbor<WH7453>; and love<WH157> no false<WH8267> oath<WH7621>: for all these are things that I hate<WH8130>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: The fast<WH6685> of the fourth<WH7243> month<WH6685>, and the fast of the fifth<WH2549>, and the fast<WH6685> of the seventh<WH7637>, and the fast<WH6685> of the tenth<WH6224>, shall be to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> joy<WH8342> and gladness<WH8057>, and cheerful<WH2896> feasts<WH4150>; therefore love<WH157> truth<WH571> and peace<WH7965>.
Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: It shall yet come to pass<WH935>, that there shall come peoples<WH5971>, and the inhabitants<WH3427> of many<WH7227> cities<WH5892>;

and the inhabitants<WH3427> of one<WH259> city shall go<WH1980> to another<WH259>, saying<WH559>, Let us go<WH3212> speedily<WH1980> to entreat<WH2470> the favor<WH6440> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and to seek<WH1245> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: I will go also<WH3212>.

Yea <WH7227>, many peoples<WH5971> and strong<WH6099> nations<WH1471> shall come<WH935> to seek<WH1245> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, and to entreat<WH2470> the favor<WH6440> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: In those days<WH3117> it shall come to pass<WH6235>, that ten men<WH582> shall take hold<WH2388>, out of all the languages<WH3956> of the nations<WH1471>, they shall take hold<WH2388> of the skirt<WH3671> of him that is a Jew<WH376>, saying<WH559>, We will go<WH3212> with you<WH8085>, for we have heard that God is with you<WH430>.
